channel.title: Shop Making Help
channel.description:
i have read few shop making guides for my server, they all basicly lead to same errors.
i got the fairy shop keeper for my bandos shop set up in shopsportal, but when you trade it nothing comes up,
please can some1 code these items into shop 4me?
Item id: 15348 Bandos chestplate cost: 50k Ammout: 999m Item id: 15349 Bandos tasset cost: 50k Ammout: 999m Item id: 15346: Armadyl chestplate cost: 50k Ammout: 999m Item id: 15347: Armadyl plateskirt cost: 50k Ammout: 999m Id: 15333 = Armadyl Godsword cost: 50k Ammout: 999m Id: 15335 = Saradomin Godsword cost: 50k Ammout: 999m 15351-Saradomin Sword cost: 50k Ammout: 999m i forgot ID - Bandos Boots cost: 50k Ammout: 999m
soif you could please code these and tell me were to put code ^^
and thanks for your help.

item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa

item.title: Shop Making Help
item.dc:creator: @T_A_G T A G
item.description:
@T_A_G wrote:

For the cost go to item.cfg fing the item ids you would like to change the first three numbers you find are the Prices,the rest are bonuses and for amount 999m of them after the item id ud put for Example 15348 999999999

Read full topic

i have read few shop making guides for my server,
